mapper.insert: insert into hotplace (user_id, image, title, join_date, `desc`, tag1, tag2, latitude, longitude, map_url) values (#{userId}, #{image}, #{title}, #{joinDate}, #{desc}, #{tag1}, #{tag2}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{mapUrl})
